metadata.title: Tuesday, 9th December, 2014
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Vice President when the Government will present the Post-2015 Development Framework for stakeholder input.
Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education when the Government will construct a 1x3 classroom block at Sipalo Primary School in Kaoma Central Parliamentary Constituency.
Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    when the Government will release funds for the construction of infrastructure at Shimumbi and Luwingu Basic Schools which have since been upgraded;
(b)    what infrastructure will be constructed at the Schools; and
(c)    how much money the project will cost.
(a)    when construction of the cultural village in Kabwe, which has stalled, will resume;
(b)    whether the Ministry is aware that the funds allocated for the project have been misused;
(c)    if so, what measures have been taken to ensure that the culprits are penalised; and
(d)    what measures have been taken to expedite the construction works.
